title: GFDL's ESM2 global coupled climate–carbon Earth System Models. Part I: physical formulation and baseline simulation characteristics
contributionStatement: Member of the core model development team. Performed approximately 50\% of the development simulations and GFDL's contributions to Coupled Model Intercomparison Project (CMIP). (C=10\% / D=50\% / A=15\% / I=10\% / W=10\%)
